Sentencas: Stack test, operated in fuel cell mode at 850 ?C for 3000 h under application of 227 mA/cm2, including 5 thermal cycles, demonstrated the effectiveness of the electrophoretically deposited Mn-Co spinel in limiting the oxide scale growth on the Crofer 22 APU.
